name: Ashoka Holidays
overview:
Leading travel agents in India, at customer service for the last 13 years, Our company, Ashoka Holidays is the part of 150 years old business house â€“ “Saraogi’s.” We are an award winning and one of the prominent travel agents serving overseas travelers who wish to explore the grandeur of India, its rich culture, magnificent monuments, heritage temples and diversity of religions. If you want a perfect holiday trip to India, we are a professional name for providing customized tours and travels services.

Our travel advisers are experienced travelers themselves, thus they are aware of individual travel needs and the travelers can always find or customize a package in accordance to their needs.

Our team of professionals in the specific field get everything organized - from beginning till the end, so that the visitors can just relax and enjoy the trip. The effective use of advanced technology based equipment and modern communication facilities also enable us to deliver best possible results as per the travel plans of the clients.

Ashoka Holidays is a member of IATA, Ministry of Tourism, TAAI and Indian Association of tour operators.
